entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
